duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for setting up and breaking down all meeting spaces with tables/chairs/water, etc.
Confirm equipment is returned and properly stored after installation/strike
Ensure that all storage rooms are kept clean and in an orderly manner
Set up and break down for banquet functions as needed including moving tables, setting tables and chairs, staging and portable stairs, podiums, bar set-up, etc
Set up and break down a variety of rooms in various styles and shapes
Lift moderate amounts of weight in the form of tables, chairs, and other equipment as required
